title: Sicily Adults-Only Cliffside Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Free-Flow Drinks Hour & Infinity Pool
description:
Carved into a cliffside above the enchanting Taormina Bay, this Sicilian haven offers endless ocean vistas and a sparkling infinity pool that is the definition of la dolce vita. Savour exceptional dining at Bellevue, where local flavours are served alongside swoon-worthy views, or simply unwind with small bites and refreshing cocktails at the chic Pool Bar.

Should you tear yourself away, stroll Taormina's quaint streets and piazzas with a gelato in hand, visit the iconic Greek Theatre and go beach hopping along the island's striking coast. Back at the hotel, indulge some more at the bespoke spa, with treatments designed to restore balance to body and mind.

vendor_name: Almar Giardino di Costanza Resort & Spa
title: Boutique Sicily All-Suite Opulence in Mazara del Vallo with Daily Breakfast
description:
Sicilian elegance awaits at this lavish five-star retreat, set among the verdant vineyards and olive groves of Mazara del Vallo. This luxurious resort offers world-class dining at AquaMadre Restaurant, serving authentic Sicilian cuisine, from the freshest Mediterranean seafood, including the region's famous red and pink prawns, to meticulously crafted European desserts. Sit by the sparkling outdoor pool, watching as the water cascades down the tiered design, indulge in a multi-sensory journey at the Almablu Spa and set out to discover the sprawling countryside gardens.

Whether you're exploring the nearby coastal town, Marzara del Vallo, or strolling the tranquil grounds, this resort promises an unforgettable escape, just minutes from the Mediterranean coast. Visit the local wineries for a taste of the region's renowned Marsala wine, including Cantine Florio winery, witness the wonder of the Sant'Ignazio church and hop from one pristine sand beach to the rocky alcove of another.
location_description: Almar Giardino di Costanza Resort & Spa
offer_address: Via Salemi, KM 7/100, Mazara del Vallo, Trapani 91026, Italy

title: Sicily Cliffside Escape near Taormina with Daily Breakfast, One Buffet Dinner & Guaranteed Ocean Views
description:
Perched atop Sicily’s stunning eastern coast, Baia Taormina is your Italian fairytale just 200 metres from the island's striking shores. Traditional wide arches, handcrafted terracotta detailing and sweeping ocean vistas are found around every corner, while a coveted location places you within easy reach of the region's cultural and natural treasures.

Admire the views from one of two cliffside pools or find your zen at the tranquil wellness centre, complete with sauna, jacuzzi, sensory showers and relaxing massages. With a complimentary shuttle to Taormina, and transfer service to a nearby beach club, the best of the island is right at your fingertips.

Spend your days lounging poolside or seaside, explore the charming streets and ancient ruins of Taormina, then return to the onsite restaurant for authentic Sicilian fare and refreshing cocktails served with views over the sparkling bay.
offer_address: Via Nazionale km 39, Marina di Forza D’Agrò, Messina, Sicily 98030, Italy

title: Historic Stay in a Former Sicilian Palazzo with Nightly Three-Course Dinners
description: Say “buongiorno” to a boutique stay at Hotel Porta Felice in the heart of Sicily’s capital, Palermo. Beautiful cathedrals and delectable Italian food await you in this stunning city, brimming with history and culture. Included in your Italian escape is daily breakfast and nightly three-course dinner for two, a complimentary Superior Room upgrade, a one-time pass to the hotel’s luxurious on-site spa, a welcome drink and 20% discount on massages at the blissful spa.

title: Gourmet Escape with Mount Etna Views
description: Perfectly placed between Mount Etna and the Ionian Sea, there’s no prettier Sicily escape than the boutique Donna Carmela hotel. A converted white 19th century mansion, this unique property is home to comfortable, modern rooms, a classic Italian ‘ristorante’ using the finest Sicilian ingredients, and a stylish glass wine cellar, featuring an extensive selection of local wines. Included in this gourmet escape is a daily continental breakfast, a two-course lunch, one three-course dinner and a complimentary aperitivo, served with a selection of delicious Sicilian finger food for two.

title: Mediterranean Oceanfront Luxury in Sicily with Panoramic Views and Direct Beach Access
description:
Perched along Mazzarò Bay in the picturesque city of Taormina, this sea-facing abode offers guests a taste of Sicilian luxury in the island's capital. Each of the beautifully appointed rooms and suites boasts a private balcony with breathtaking sea views, while the hotel's two restaurants serve a tantalising mix of local and international cuisine.

Be spoilt for choice with the option of a glittering pool to dive into or swim in the open blue Sicilian ocean. Add a little Italian therapy at the onsite Hyd'Or Spa and indulge in holistic wellness practices. Take advantage of the coveted location and explore the nearby Isola Bella nature reserve, or stroll along the Corso Umberto for a taste of Taormina's vibrant shopping scene.
